name: Trafficlock
tagline: Ever been late to work due to traffic? We can help.
body:
A smart alarm clock that wakes you up in time. The app analyzes current traffic times using ArcGIS and weather trends using World Weather Online to wake up the user in time to get to their destination.
After configuring your settings, all that needs to be done is to press the "Activate" button for the app to wake you up on time!
App before activation:
![](http://i.imgur.com/sRSOzd3.png=20x50)
App after activation:
![](http://i.imgur.com/T7ooAUv.png)
App when the alarm goes off:
![](http://i.imgur.com/SSQ04zE.png)
The settings page:
![](http://i.imgur.com/eMyNWx4.png)
Repeat the alarm whichever days are best:
![](http://i.imgur.com/3MnqHYN.png)
Enter your destination address:
![](http://i.imgur.com/XPmL7Rc.png)
When do you have to be at your destination?
![](http://i.imgur.com/PgpkqZp.png)
If traffic and weather are perfect outside, what's the latest time you want to wake up? Think of this setting as your normal alarm clock:
![](http://i.imgur.com/gFZCGsi.png)
How much time does it take for you to get ready in the morning:
![](http://i.imgur.com/eYeQVnX.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
